string.name: signupDescription
string.i: Join us and take the first step towards a healthier you! Sign up now to start your journey.

resources.string: Log your daily emotions and experiences to uncover patterns in your mood. Our app helps you understand what affects your well-being.
Receive tailored advice and recommendations based on your unique emotional data. Let our AI guide you to better mental health.
Set and track goals for habits that improve your mental well-being. Stay motivated with reminders and positive reinforcement.
